summary: A bizarre black-and-white film noir reworking of Shakespeare's 'Hamlet'. After the death of his father, young Hamlet inherits a seat on the board of a company controlled by his uncle that ... See full summary »
cast: Pirkka-Pekka Petelius|Esko Salminen|Kati Outinen|Elina Salo|Esko Nikkari|Kari Väänänen|Puntti Valtonen|Mari Rantasila|Turo Pajala|Aake Kalliala|Pentti Auer|Matti Pellonpää|Vesa Mäkelä|Maija Leino|Pertti Sveholm|Vesa Vierikko|Miitta Sorvali|Erkki Astala|Melrose|Jouko Mäki|Pentti Hirvikangas|Reino Laitinen|Anton Ortamo|Ralf Nordgren|Helmeri Pellonpää|Jarmo Anio|Jalo|Hallu|Sanna Fransman|Malla Hukkanen|Jaakko Talaskivi
title: Hamlet vuelve a los negocios
